Name: Tn polyagglutination syndrome
Definition: A hematopoietic system disease that is characterized by red blood cells that agglutinate upon exposure to almost all human sera

Name: blood coagulation disease
Definition: An anemia that is characterized by a reduction in the number of red blood cells

Name: anemia
Definition: A hematopoietic system disease that is characterized by a decrease in the normal number of red blood cells.

Name: hereditary elliptocytosis
Definition: A hematopoietic system disease characterized by oval or elliptical red blood cells

Name: obsolete chronic progressive multiple sclerosis
Definition: A hematopoietic system disease characterized by oval or elliptical red blood cells

Name: hematologic cancer
Definition: An organ system cancer located in the hematological system that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in blood

Name: blood group incompatibility
Definition: An immune system disease that is an overactive immune response of the body against substances and tissues normally present in the body resulting from an abnormal functioning of the immune system that results in the production of antibodies or T cell directed against the host tissues.
Synonym: Rh incompatibility affecting management of mother

Name: bone marrow disease
Definition: A hematopoietic cancer that derives_from the blood-forming stem cells of the bone marrow.

Name: blood protein disease
Definition: An arthritis that is an autoimmune disease which develops due to an infection located elsewhere in the body.

Name: obsolete recurrent malignant pericardial mesothelioma
Definition: An arthritis that is an autoimmune disease which develops due to an infection located elsewhere in the body.

Name: leukocyte disease
Definition: A hematopoietic system disease that is located_in white blood cells.
